quoteText: (iii) THE RESULTS THAT MAY BE OBTAINED FROM THE USE OF THE SERVICE WILL BE ACCURATE OR RELIABLE, (iv) THE QUALITY OF ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, INFORMATION, OR OTHER MATERIAL PURCHASED OR OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE SERVICE WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS
title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

tosdr.case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
tosdr.tldr:
Discogs' ToS state that "DISCOGS MAKES NO WARRANTY THAT [...] (iii) THE RESULTS THAT MAY BE OBTAINED FROM THE USE OF THE SERVICE WILL BE ACCURATE OR RELIABLE, (iv) THE QUALITY OF ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, INFORMATION, OR OTHER MATERIAL PURCHASED OR OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE SERVICE WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS [...]".
Much of the information given on the site is user-generated content, thus the website cannot ascertain accuracy of the information.
